author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Reliance Jio says Current Prime Members To Get Complimentary Benefits For One More Yr
text:
March 30 (Reuters) - Reliance Jio :
* PRIME MEMBERS WITH EXCLUSIVE MEMBERSHIP SUBSCRIPTION TILL MARCH 31, TO GET ANOTHER YEAR OF COMPLIMENTARY PRIME BENEFITS AT NO EXTRA FEE
* FOR NEW JIO USERS, JIO PRIME MEMBERSHIP CONTINUES TO BE AVAILABLE AT ANNUAL MEMBERSHIP FEES OF 99 RUPEES Source text - After enabling an enriched Digital Life experience for over 175 million Jio Prime Members, Jio now brings another bonanza for its existing PRIME members. All Jio PRIME members who have subscribed to the exclusive membership benefits till 31st March 2018 will get another year of complimentary PRIME benefits at NO additional fee (LIMITED PERIOD OFFER). Jio deeply values its loyal PRIME members and will continue to deliver additional benefits and superior value to these founding members. For new Jio users, the Jio Prime Membership continues to be available at an annual membership fees of Rs 99. Further company coverage:
